item.title: Christian add a quote by Ally Carter
item.description: "Number of empty Ben & Jerry's containers: 3 -- two mint chocolate cookie, one plain vanilla. (Who buys plain vanilla ice cream from Ben & Jerry's, anyway? Is there a greater waste?)" -- Ally Carter

item.title: Christian add a quote by Cecily von Ziegesar
item.description:
"It was so typical. Whenever Blair did anything nice for someone else, she usually regretted it.
Which kind of explained why she was such a bitch most of the time." -- Cecily von Ziegesar

item.title: Christian add a quote by Lisi Harrison
item.description: "Sorry, No conprendo I don't speak Loser." -- Lisi Harrison

item.title: Christian add a quote by Lisi Harrison
item.description: "One question:do you want to hang ten or BE a ten?"-Massie Block" -- Lisi Harrison

item.title: Christian add a quote by Lisi Harrison
item.description: "Claire, did I invite you to my barbeque?" Massie asked, her neck tilting to the right and her arms tightly crossed. "Huh? No. I mean, I don't know," Claire said. "Then why are you all up in my <i>grill?</i>" Massie said through her teeth." -- Lisi Harrison

item.title: Christian add a quote by Jennifer Crusie
item.description: "If you can't be a good example, you'll just have to be a horrible warning." -Gwen Goodnight" -- Jennifer Crusie

item.title: Christian add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "I have made a lot of mistakes falling in love, and regretted most of them, but never the potatoes that went with them." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Christian add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "You can fix anything but a blank page." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Christian add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Insane people are always sure that they are fine. It is only the sane people who are willing to admit that they are crazy." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Christian add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "If pregnancy were a book they would cut the last two chapters." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Christian add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Writing is like sex. First you do it for love, then you do it for your friends, and then you do it for money." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Christian add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Books are the mirrors of the soul." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Christian add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Christian add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "There was no pleasure like being envied on a mass scale." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Christian add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "The headiest loves were the loves that couldn't be." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Christian add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "The first stab of love is like a sunset, a blaze of color -- oranges, pearly pinks, vibrant purples..." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Christian add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "They were a society whose chief vocations were to entertain and be entertained ..." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Christian add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "Things only looked wrong when there was someone to see you." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "Don't dare a person who has nothing else left to lose." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "What are you gonna do, angel face? Stab me with your eyebrow pencil?" -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "If I could put my brain in her body, the world would be mine for the taking." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "When male authors write love stories, the heroine tends to end up dead." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description:
"I guess we're oil and water. (Phoebe)
I'd say we're more like gasoline and a blowtorch. (Dan)" -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
item.description: "Anything worth having is worth fighting for." -- Susan Elizabeth Phillips

item.title: Christian add a quote by Gena Showalter
item.description: "Ten Things You Shouldn't Say on a Date. 1. You're wearing that? 2. Something smells funny. 3. Where's the Tylenol? 4. And to think, I first wanted to date your brother. 5. I have a confession to make… 6. My dad has a suit just like that. 7. That man is hot. Look at him. 8. My ex, may he rot in hell forever… 9. You're going to order that? Seriously? 10. You're how old?" -- Gena Showalter

item.title: Christian add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You're always you, and that don't change, and you're always changing, and there's nothing you can do about it." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Christian add a quote by Christian Simamora
item.description: "Tapi kalo aku ngelupain kamu, aku lupa caranya bahagia." -- Christian Simamora

item.title: Christian add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Menulis adalah sebuah keberanian..." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Christian add a quote by Christian Simamora
item.description: "Kalo gue bener-bener mencintai lo, gue juga harus belajar melepaskan lo.... - Good Fight" -- Christian Simamora

item.title: Christian add a quote by Christian Simamora
item.description: "Kamu bener-bener selalu ngedapetin apa yang kamu mau ya?" | "Nggak semuanya. Karena aku belum memiliki kamu lagi." - Good Fight" -- Christian Simamora
